name: photoconductive
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
If a substance is photoconductive, it allows an electrical current to move more easily through it after light shines on it: The laser printer contains a photoconductive surface. Selenium has excellent photoconductive properties.
More examplesFewer examplesThe screen is coated with a photoconductive detector.This switch is activated by a laser using the photoconductive effect.The conductivity of the photoconductive cells increases as more light falls on them.Photoconductive antennas are a popular choice for transmitters and receivers.
